title: Bluestone National Scenic River: Safety
body: Safety          Â    Taking time to plan and prepare for your visit to Bluestone National Scenic River will better ensure that you have a safe and enjoyable time. Look over the following items to better understand some of the possible hazards and safety issues you may encounter.  Water Safety  Biking Safety  Hiking Safety  Poisonous Snakes  Spiders and Insects  Poison Ivy  Heat Related Illness  Hypothermia  Lightning
